channel.title: Bringing Together Arlo and Heather
channel.description: Recent content on Bringing Together Arlo and Heather

item.title: Creating the Website
item.description: So this website is so pretty? Right? OMG. There was an incredible amount of management required. For example, he kept distracting me with questions that really didn’t seem to matter and involved showing me things that looked like this …

item.title: Gaming Focus
item.description:
Arlo has an interesting ability to focus, especially when it comes to games. I’ll never forget my introduction to cooperative games.

“Oh you’ll love them, let’s have a game night … we’ll drink whiskey and have charcuterie … and we’ll play a game.“

item.title: Conversation
item.description: Lots of comment streams. Totally a forum. The blog-like thing is actually the Journey pages.

item.title: Events
item.description: Hey, just a quick warning. If you can see this, then there's a lot of this site you can't see. Oh, and we also won't be able to save anything or notice when you ask to be invited to stuff. Please turn on javascript. Hey, just a quick warning. If you can see this, then there's a lot of this site you can't see. Oh, and we also won't be able to save anything or notice when you ask to be invited to stuff.
